title: Portuguese Society of Cardiology Congress
tagline: Join ACC President Dr. Roxana Mehran for a joint scientific session.
description: A national forum focused on clinical innovation, guideline-based practice, and collaboration to advance cardiovascular care across Portugal and beyond.

title: 37th Singapore Cardiac Society Annual Scientific Meeting
tagline: Join ACC's Immediate-Past President Dr. Chris Kramer for an ACC educational session.
description: A premier gathering in Southeast Asia highlighting regional perspectives, emerging research, and practical advances in cardiovascular care.
